name: iWing Maze 2
description:
Play an exciting adventure in search of a strange alien energy source!

Inspired by the classic game Kuru Kuru Kururin, iWing Maze 2 is an action puzzle game that lets you discover the universe as a unique spaceship pilot!

In this challenging game, you wake up after a long cryogenic sleep and find yourself alone in a spaceship with Joe as your only companion.

Joe is a lovely robot that will guide you through an intergalactic action puzzle game, listen carefully to his advice, the space is full of danger!

Take on challenges and explore new worlds to collect as many gravitons as you can, they are the most valuable source of energy in the whole universe…

Welcome to a beautiful game full of surprises and boundless exploration. Agility and speed are your best allies to survive.

iWing Maze 2 is an action puzzle game for adults that combines funny storytelling, wonderful 2D visuals, and a stimulating and fun gameplay into one magic action puzzle game you will never forget.

The players of this challenging game will have to constantly improve their skills in order to progress to new levels.

Joe and you can start this fun game at any time, but, would you be alone out there? Enemies, allies, and much more are waiting for you!

Discover the secrets and worlds hidden throughout iWing Maze 2!

Are you ready to explore a whole new universe?

Play this casual game free to download and enjoy an outstanding gaming experience!

**MAIN GAME FEATURES**

★ Free to Play

★ Action puzzle game offline

★ Innovative physics-based gameplay

★ +50 levels

★ 3 difficulty modes

★ 4 ships & 10 bonus to be unlocked

★ Exciting new items, allies, enemies, and worlds to discover

★ Easy controls

★ Increasingly difficult challenges

★ Stylized graphics and soundtrack

★ Meteoric, intense action game with puzzles

★ More levels and content coming in updates

★ Inspired by the game Kuru Kuru Kururin
